segments.text: Well , I am a regular member of this club .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have to pay to join ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , membership fees vary depending on the club but usually they run into tens of thousands of dollars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , that much ? Don't they have any public courses ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Extremely good . I shot a 78 , including 5 birdies !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ten . How did your game go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My drives were terrible today . I kept slicing the ball into the roughs and sand traps .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe you can correct it by going to a driving range before you play again .
segments.speaker: S1
